caseTitle: Abdullah Jumani & others v. Province of Sindh & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 3 of Sindh (Regularization of Adhoc and Contract Employees) Act, 2013 (2) Article 240 of the Constitution         (3) High Court cannot exercise suo motu jurisdiction under Article 199 as compared to Article 184(3) of the Constitution (4) The courts commit judicial overreach when they exercise powers beyond the compass of jurisdiction.
